• {{ product.name }}
import { Component, Host, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../product'; import { ProductsService } from '../products.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-favorites', templateUrl: './favorites.component.html', styleUrls: ['./favorites.component.css'] }) export class FavoritesComponent implements OnInit { products: Product[] = []; constructor(private productService: ProductsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.products = this.productService.getProducts(); } }
